HaaLouLing:IaiSlash.NAME: Iai Slash
HaaLouLing:IaiSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL tlipocamod:Sheathed : gain !M! Strength.

HaaLouLing:Flow.NAME: Flow
HaaLouLing:Flow.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When the tlipocamod:Lock of a card is changed by 1, gain !M! Block.
HaaLouLing:Flow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When the tlipocamod:Lock of a card is changed by 1, gain !M! Block.

HaaLouLing:HelmBreaker.NAME: Helm Breaker
HaaLouLing:HelmBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Lose 1 Strength. NL tlipocamod:Sheathed : Unplayable.
HaaLouLing:HelmBreaker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. Lose 1 Strength. NL tlipocamod:Sheathe. NL tlipocamod:Sheathed : Unplayable.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I cannot play this card when #rSheathed !

HaaLouLing:InnerForce.NAME: Inner Force
HaaLouLing:InnerForce.DESCRIPTION: Double the tlipocamod:Lock value of a card, then gain Block equal to its tlipocamod:Lock .

HaaLouLing:Intimidate.NAME: Intimidate
HaaLouLing:Intimidate.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies intending to attack and !M! Vulnerable to those not. NL Exhaust.
HaaLouLing:Intimidate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

HaaLouLing:Kendo.NAME: Kendo
HaaLouLing:Kendo.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Strength each time you play an Attack until you play a non-Attack card this turn. NL tlipocamod:Sheath. Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

HaaLouLing:Knowledge.NAME: Knowledge
HaaLouLing:Knowledge.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL tlipocamod:Lock a card by !M! .

HaaLouLing:LastBreath.NAME: Last Breath
HaaLouLing:LastBreath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. When in your hand, each Attack played increases its damage by !M! . Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Cannot play with cards not locked in hand!

HaaLouLing:Lou.NAME: Lou
HaaLouLing:Lou.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL Gain [E] next turn.

HaaLouLing:Retrace.NAME: Retrace
HaaLouLing:Retrace.DESCRIPTION: The fist card you play each turn will return to your hand from the discard pile.

HaaLouLing:MutualDestruction.NAME: Mutual Destruction
HaaLouLing:MutualDestruction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. If enemy is still alive, draw a card less next turn.

HaaLouLing:Unleash.NAME: Unleash
HaaLouLing:Unleash.DESCRIPTION: Lower the tlipocamod:Lock value of a card by !M! , each layer gain !B! Block for you.

HaaLouLing:Seal.NAME: Seal
HaaLouLing:Seal.DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Lock at most !M! cards by 2, gain [E] for each.

HaaLouLing:ShadowBlade.NAME: Shadow Blade
HaaLouLing:ShadowBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When in your hand, play a copy of this card when you play an Attack. NL Exhaust.

HaaLouLing:SharpEdge.NAME: Sharp Edge
HaaLouLing:SharpEdge.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy for each tlipocamod:Locked card in your hand.

HaaLouLing:SpiritBloom.NAME: Spirit Bloom
HaaLouLing:SpiritBloom.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the tlipocamod:Lock value of all cards in your hand by !M! when a card is tlipocamod:Unlocked.

HaaLouLing:WineGourd.NAME: Wine Gourd
HaaLouLing:WineGourd.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand from 3 cards of the type same as the last card played this combat. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust .

HaaLouLing:HaaLouBook.NAME: Haa Lou Book
HaaLouLing:HaaLouBook.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is tlipocamod:Locked, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL When this card is tlipocamod:Unlocked, apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

HaaLouLing:HaaLouTreasure.NAME: Haa Lou Treasure
HaaLouLing:HaaLouTreasure.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, permanently lower its cost by 1.

HaaLouLing:Petal.NAME: Petal
HaaLouLing:Petal.DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Mastery. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If there is no other *Petal in your hand, Exhaust and return all *Petals in discard pile to your hand.

HaaLouLing:Flower.NAME: Flower
HaaLouLing:Flower.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Petals into your discard pile. NL When Retained, add a *Petal into your discard pile.
HaaLouLing:Flower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Petals+ into your discard pile. NL When Retained, add a *Petal+ into your discard pile.

HaaLouLing:SpiritSlash.NAME: Spirit Slash
HaaLouLing:SpiritSlash.DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Mastery. NL Deal !D! damage. NL tlipocamod:Sheathed : Draw a card.

HaaLouLing:HaaLouCrossDouble.NAME: HaaLou Cross: Double
HaaLouLing:HaaLouCrossDouble.DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Mastery. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL tlipocamod:Sheathed : Play twice.

HaaLouLing:Ling.NAME: Ling
HaaLouLing:Ling.DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Unlockable. NL If there is no other card can be played in your hand, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

HaaLouLing:VanishingShadow.NAME: Vanishing Shadow
HaaLouLing:VanishingShadow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL tlipocamod:Unlock ALL tlipocamod:Locked cards in your hand, and draw that many cards.

HaaLouLing:Ichimonji.NAME: Haa Lou Art: Ichimonji
HaaLouLing:Ichimonji.DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Mastery. tlipocamod:Eternity. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Return from discard pile to hand.

HaaLouLing:QuickDraw.NAME: Quick Draw
HaaLouLing:QuickDraw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is the first Attack you play this turn, gain !M! temporary Strength , draw a card.

HaaLouLing:BloodShake.NAME: Blood Shake
HaaLouLing:BloodShake.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL tlipocamod:Sheathe. NL If the last card played in this combat is an Attack, draw a card and upgrade it.

HaaLouLing:Flurry.NAME: Flurry
HaaLouLing:Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL End your turn.
